item.description:
Please help our friends to make a success out of this - They never hesitate to come up here to help us with our events.

PNI CLUB
290 Millbury street
Worcester , MA 01605


Description:

Hello, please save the date!


We will be having a major rally for Ron Paul in Worcester at the PNI club from 7 - 11pm.

We will have a standout before around 4:30 / 5PM nearby at a location TBA.

The fundraiser will feature a GREAT catered dinner from Zimmy's kitchen, live entertainment, a few guest speakers, door prizes and a more! All this for only $25, of which 100% will go to Ron Paul's campaign!

We are expecting to fill the place which holds 300 people and tickets are for sale now. We are notifying the media and finalizing all the last minute details. I will update as we have more information.

This is a great opportunity to "rally the troops" in a fun, and entertaining environment that is sure to attract alot of publicity and motivate others to join the campaign. We will also have an opportunity to raise some needed cash that will go directly to national headquarters!
item.name: Fundraiser for Ron Paul
